snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes a sexist Twitter post from Asus at an electronics conference, a theory that Google Street View photos will be used...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes a sexist Twitter post from Asus at an electronics conference, a theory that Google Street View photos will be used to train robot cars and a review thread on Yelp about a California jail.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Jail on Yelp and Google Cars
